Attribute.Name: HeaderCharges
Attribute.Description: Header Charge amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: HeaderDiscount
Attribute.Description: Header discount amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: HeaderTax
Attribute.Description: Tax amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: Reference1
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information.

Attribute.Name: TotalCharges
Attribute.Description: Total charge amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: TotalDiscount
Attribute.Description: Total discount amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: TotalHeaderCharges
Attribute.Description: Total header charge amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: TotalTax
Attribute.Description: Total tax amount in the invoice.

Description.div:
Indicates if data is retrieved from the history table or the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Description.div: The total amount of charges applied on the order and lines.
The total amount of discounts applied on the order and lines.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the entire order.

Description.div: The total amount of taxes applied on the order and lines.
The total amount of charges applied directly to the order header.
The total amount of discounts applied directly to the order header.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the order header only.

Description.div: The total amount of taxes applied directly to the order header.
The total amount of the order excluding line totals.
The line sub total for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.
The percentage of the total for which manual discounts were applied. Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines / (Order Total - Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines)

The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold. ( (Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation) - (Sum of Item Cost across all lines))/(Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+Charges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned.

Attribute.Name: RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Element.Description: Represents the total charges and discounts on the order for the specified ChargeCategory and ChargeName.

Attribute.Name: ChargeCategory
Attribute.Description: The charge category for the OverallChargeTotal.

Attribute.Name: ChargeName
Attribute.Description: The charge name for the OverallChargeTotal.

Attribute.Name: GrandCharges
Attribute.Description: The total charges on the order for the ChargeCategory - ChargeName combination.

Attribute.Name: GrandDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total discounts on the order for the ChargeCategory - ChargeName combination.

Attribute.Name: IsManual
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine.

Attribute.Name: IsShippingCharge
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Description.div: The total amount in the enterprise's currency of charges applied on the order and lines.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of discounts applied on the order and lines.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of taxes applied on the order and lines.
The grand total in the enterprise's currency for the order. Includes all line charges and taxes.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of charges applied directly to the order header.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of discounts applied directly to the order header.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of taxes applied directly to the order header.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of the order excluding line totals.
The line sub total in the enterprise's currency for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.

Attribute.Name: RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Reference name.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Reference value.

Attribute.Name: TotalLines
Attribute.Description: Total number of invoice lines.

Attribute.Name: OrderInvoiceDetailKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_ORDER_INVOICE_DETAIL.

Attribute.Name: UnitPrice
Attribute.Description: Unit price of invoice line item.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: ProductClass
Attribute.Description: Product class of the item.

Attribute.Name: ExtendedPrice
Attribute.Description: ExtendedPrice of the AdditionalLinePrice for this OrderLine. Equal to the Price of the additional line times ActualPricingQuantity.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key for a charge name.

Attribute.Name: IsBillable
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is billable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsDiscount
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is discountable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsShippingCharge
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key for a charge name.

Attribute.Name: Reference1
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information. This field can be customized by the Enterprise.

Attribute.Name: Reference2
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information. This field can be customized by the Enterprise.

Attribute.Name: Reference3
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information. This field can be customized by the Enterprise.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key for a charge name.

Attribute.Name: IsBillable
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is billable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsDiscount
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is discountable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key for a charge name.

Attribute.Name: IsBillable
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is billable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsDiscount
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is discountable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsShippingCharge
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key for a charge name.

Attribute.Name: Reference1
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information. This field can be customized by the Enterprise.

Attribute.Name: Reference2
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information. This field can be customized by the Enterprise.

Attribute.Name: Reference3
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information. This field can be customized by the Enterprise.

Attribute.Name: TotalLines
Attribute.Description: Total number of collection details fetched.

Attribute.Name: AmountCollected
Attribute.Description: Total collected amount.

Attribute.Name: HoldAgainstBook
Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate the precharged amount has to be kept on hold.

Attribute.Name: TransactionDate
Attribute.Description: Date on which transaction was made.

Attribute.Name: AuthAvs
Attribute.Description: AVS Autorization code.

Attribute.Name: AuthReturnFlag
Attribute.Description: Authorization Return Flag.

Attribute.Name: RequestId
Attribute.Description: Authorization request Id.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: DisplayPrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Description.div: The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit, if it was invoked. If the order is created for a customer and the payment method is a valid customer payment method, it indicates the amount available for the customer account. If customer account is not maintained internally or if the MaxChargeLimit is not set on the customer payment method, this value is returned as 0.
Indicates if the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit was invoked for this payment method.

Attribute.Name: PrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Attribute.Name: RequestedAuthAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of authorizations sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of charges sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedRefundAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of refunds sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method. This number will be positive. This total will no longer be included in the RequestedChargeAmount, but if an asynchronous refund is submitted in excess of this amount, the RequestedChargeAmount will be reduced for backwards compatibility.
